article_title: Editorial: Should the rich pay more taxes?

article_metadata.description: The 2016 presidential campaign is shaping up as something of a referendum on taxes in general and the taxes paid by the richest Americans in particular.Most of the Republicans have released detailed tax proposals, all of which include cutting taxes for the wealthiest taxpayers. The Democratic candidates are unanimous in their condemnation of income inequality and their determination to make the wealthiest filers pay more.One way to make the next debate over taxes more interesting than the last

og.description: The 2016 presidential campaign is shaping up as something of a referendum on taxes in general and the taxes paid by the richest Americans in particular.
